SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+1,'YYYYmmDD') YMD, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS') TIME FROM DUAL

SELECT MENUCD, MENUNAME, DECODE(PMENUCD,'0000000000','0',PMENUCD) PMENUCD, EXEGBN, URI FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY PMENUCD, LV ORDER BY SORT_KEY) RNUM, MENUCD, MENUNAME, PMENUCD, LV, SORT_KEY, SCRN_PARM, URI, EXEGBN FROM ( SELECT MENUCD, MENUNAME, PMENUCD, LV, SORT_KEY, SCRN_PARM, URI, EXEGBN FROM M_MENU_MT WHERE EXEGBN = '0' UNION ALL SELECT MENUCD, MENUNAME, PMENUCD, LV, SORT_KEY, SCRN_PARM, URI, EXEGBN FROM M_MENU_MT WHERE EXEGBN = '1' ) ) A START WITH PMENUCD = '0000000000' CONNECT BY PRIOR MENUCD = PMENUCD ORDER SIBLINGS BY SORT_KEY, MENUNAME
